text: William Henry Nieder (August 10, 1933 â€“ October 7, 2022)University of Kansas shot put phenom/Olympian Bill Nieder dies at age 89 was an American athlete who mainly competed in the shot put. ==References== == Other websites == Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:American shot putters Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lawrence, Kansas
